verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I stand to praise You
But I fall to my knees
My spirit is hungry
But my flesh is so weak

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Light the fire in my soul
Fan the flame make me whole
Oh Lord You know just where I've been
So light the fire in my heart once again

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I feel Your arms around me
As the power of Your healing begins
You breathe new life right through me
Like a mighty rushing wind

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
